about_the_game:
A beautiful pack of art from Hidden Cats in Santa's Realm is available as a Coloring Book with 20 pages and Coloring Poster. Both are PDF files with printing resolution, but they can also be used to make a nice digital painting on your preferred software.

You can get a nice gift for family, friends, or yourself. Let's relax and stimulate our creativity, and share your paintings.
Meow, and this is a great way to support us!

Contents:
  • colorbook_hcsantasrealm.pdf (A4 page size)
  • poster_A1_hcsantasrealm.pdf
(A1 page size)
  • poster_A1_hcsnowballfight.pdf
(A1 page size)

After downloading, get the PDF files in the game directory where it is installed

1 - Go to your library, find the game, and click with the second mouse button.
2 - Click on Properties, Local Files
3 - Click on Browse

This will open the game directory and you'll see the folder called "DLC_Coloring_Book" or something similar.
